QuestData.Title: Message to Base
QuestData.Description:
We did it! What a rush! Is this how it feels to be an adventurer?
I could get used to it!
Let's get back to camp and inform the captain of our success.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to the Alliance Camp and speak with Captain Garrick.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to the Alliance Camp and speak with Captain Garrick.
QuestData.RewardText:
I'm relieved you rescued Meredy. That's one more life saved and one fewer sacrificed.
And I'm glad to see you helped Henry get back to his old self.
We'll work with Meredy to figure out a plan of action.
